original_text: And the Pharisees and Sadducees came, and to test him they asked him to show them a sign from heaven.
korean_text: 바리새인과 사두개인들이 와서 예수를 시험하여 하늘로부터 오는 표적 보이기를 청하니

sentences.original_text: And the Pharisees and Sadducees came,
and to test him they asked him
to show them a sign from heaven.
